From: "Logo morph" <logomorph@...>

::Battera::

She rammed the grid and broke loose from the base.  The electric shock she 
got almost made her lose consousness.  She fell down the side of the outside 
walll fo the base.  It took her a moment to get her bearings and she flew 
off into the trees.  Her color blending in making her almost invivible. 
Rattled, damaged, feeling betrayed, she took to the trees and found a very 
high branch that would support her weight.  She hung up side down and waited 
for internal systems to repair themselves.
"Oh boy,  I got turned into this TM3 for nothing.  Now I will never make it 
home."
She hung there in silence and in pain.
